snippet: The Philadelphia superintendent of schools made a last-minute plea for funding saying he needs at least an additional $96 million.
abstract: Philadelphia superintendent of schools William R Hite Jr makes last-minute plea for funding to city and state lawmakers, saying he needs at least an additional $96 million to offer students even a 'wholly inadequate' education in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia superintendent of schools made a last-minute plea for funding saying he needs at least an additional $96 million.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Philadelphia Schools Seek More Money
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Philadelphia Schools Seek More Money
